title: MASTERING WEB3 | University of Nicosia
description: Comprehensive course covering Web3, Blockchain Technology, DeFi, and Tokenization concepts.

title: 4G-LTE EPC: Evolved Packet Core Network

title: VoLTE | Voice Over LTE & IMS Network
description: In-depth training on IMS Network Architecture, VoLTE Call Flows, VoLTE Performance Metrics, and SIP Protocol.

title: Mobile CS Voice Core Concepts in 2G GSM, 3G UMTS & 4G-LTE
description: Comprehensive coverage of Voice Call Flows, ISUP Protocol, and SIP Protocol across multiple generations.

title: SS7 & SIGTRAN technologies, Architecture & signaling flows
description: Advanced training on SS7 Protocol Stack and SIGTRAN Protocol Stack technologies.

title: SIP | Session Initiation Protocol in Cellular Networks
description: Specialized course on SIP Protocol, SIP Diagrams, and Call Flows in cellular networks.

title: Qlik Sense for Data Science and Business Intelligence
description: Business Intelligence training focused on creating dashboards and data visualization using Qlik Sense.

title: Microsoft Excel: Business Intelligence w/ Power Query & DAX
description: Advanced Excel training covering Data Analytics and Power Query for business intelligence applications.

title: Bash Scripting and Shell Programming
description: Comprehensive training on Shell Scripts and UNIX Bash programming for automation and system administration.

title: Agile Development Practices
description: Project management training focused on Agile methodologies and problem-solving techniques.

title: CompTIA A+
description: Foundational IT certification covering software troubleshooting, security, and virtualization.

title: 4G LTE: Technology, Architecture and Protocols
description: Deep dive into LTE technology, covering network architecture, protocols, and performance optimization.

title: Signaling SS7 in Mobile Cellular wireless Networks
description: Comprehensive coverage of SS7 signaling in mobile networks, focusing on protocols and network design.

title: Introduction to Digital Currencies
description: Foundation course in digital currencies, blockchain technology, and cryptocurrency ecosystems.

title: Ethereum: Building Blockchain DApps
description: Hands-on course in developing decentralized applications on the Ethereum blockchain.

title: Blockchain: Beyond the Basics
description: Advanced blockchain concepts and applications in business contexts.

title: Blockchain Basics
description: Introduction to blockchain technology fundamentals and use cases.

title: TOEFL iBT
description: English language proficiency certification for academic and professional purposes.

title: Introduction to Oracle SQL
